attributes.action: Give care workers the same recognition as NHS workers.
attributes.additional_details: I want carers, whether they be homecare staff or work in a care home, to have the recognition they deserve. They do not recieve the same recognition as NHS workers or teachers etc, when they most definitely should.
attributes.background: Give care workers more recognition in what they do. Whether they are home carers or work in a care home.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:
We would like the government to consider social care as equally important to NHS:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302897

You may also wish to sign some of these petitions:

Raise the minimum wage for Domiciliary Care Workers to £12 per hour immediately:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314394

Reward our healthcare heroes now for risking their lives to fight Covid-19:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318741

Pay bonus to all key workers:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
